publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3219 Mr Lloyd Quinan: Batasuna-That the Parliament condemns the decision of the Spanish Government to proscribe the Basque National Party Batasuna and calls upon Her Majesty's Government to resist any attempts by the Spanish Government to add Batasuna to the European list of terrorist organisations.
S1M-3219 Batasuna (lodged on 14 June 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-3219 Batasuna (lodged on 14 June 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3219 Batasuna (lodged on 14 June 2002) Mr John McAllion*
